blocks.data:
### OAuth Scopes
|  **UI Name** | **Permission** | **Parameter** |
| --- | --- | --- |
|  Products | modify | `store_v2_products` |
|  Products | read-only | `store_v2_products_read_only` |

### Headers

|Header|Parameter|Description|
|-|-|-|
|`X-Auth-Token`|`access_token `|Obtained by creating an API account or installing an app in a BigCommerce control panel.|

### Example

```http
GET /stores/{$$.env.store_hash}/v3/catalog/summary
host: api.bigcommerce.com
Content-Type: application/json
X-Auth-Token: {access_token}
```

* For more information on Authenticating BigCommerce APIs, see: [Authentication](https://developer.bigcommerce.com/api-docs/getting-started/authentication). 
* **Name**: X-Auth-Token
* **Location**: header

price_list_id.description: The ID of the `Price List` requested.

variant_id.description: ID of the variant on a product, or on an associated Price List Record.

currency_code.description: The currency code associated with the price record being acted upon.

include.description: Sub-resources to include on a price record, in a comma-separated list. Valid expansions currently include `bulk_pricing_tiers` and `sku`.  Other valies will be ignored.

data.description: Response payload for the BigCommerce API.

calculated_price.description: The price of the variant as seen on the storefront if a price record is in effect. It will be equal to the `sale_price`, if set, and the `price` if there is not a `sale_price`.  Read only.

date_created.description: The date on which the Price entry was created.

date_modified.description: The date on which the Price entry was created.

product_id.description: The id of the `Product` this `Price Record`'s variant_id is associated with.  Read only.

allOf.description: Price Record object used in batch create or update.

price_list_id.description: The Price List with which this price set is associated.

variant_id.description: The variant with which this price set is associated. Either variant_id or sku is required.

sku.description: The variant with which this price set is associated. Either sku or variant_id is required.

currency.description: The 3-letter currency code with which this price set is associated.

allOf.title: Price Record Identifiers

price.description: The list price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog list price for the variant/product.

sale_price.description: The sale price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog sale price for the variant/product. If empty, the sale price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

retail_price.description: The retail price for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog retail price for the variant/product.  If empty, the retail price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

map_price.description: The MAP (Manufacturer's Advertised Price) for the variant mapped in a Price List. Overrides any existing or Catalog MAP price for the variant/product. If empty, the MAP price will be treated as not being set on this variant.

quantity_min.description: The minimum quantity of associated variant in the cart needed to qualify for this tiers pricing.

quantity_max.description: The maximum allowed quantity of associated variant in the cart to qualify for this tiers pricing.

type.description: The type of adjustment that is made. Acceptable values: price – the adjustment amount per product; percent – the adjustment as a percentage of the original price; fixed – the adjusted absolute price of the product.

amount.description: The price adjustment amount. This value along with the type will decide the price per variant for the pricing tier.

sku.description: The SKU code associated with this `Price Record` if requested and it exists.

meta.description: Empty meta object; may be used later.
